Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in April 2022. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. WHO Weekly Report:[18] WHO Weekly Report:[49] WHO Weekly Report:[83] WHO Weekly Report:[115] Countries and territories that confirmed their first cases during April 2022: By the end of April, only the following countries and territories had not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in April 2022 - Wikipedia
